protected java.util.Vector _vec

get

public Attribute get(int id)
Locate an attribute by index number. Index numbers start at zero.
Parameters:
id - A zero based index that specifies the attribute to retrieve.
Returns:
The Attribute object that was found.

get

public Attribute get(java.lang.String id)
Locate an attribute by its name. The search is case-insensitive.
Parameters:
id - The attribute name to search for.
Returns:
The Attribute object that was located.

Returns true of this AttributeList is empty, with no attributes.

public int length()
Returns the number of Attributes in this AttributeList.
Returns:
The number of Attributes in this AttributeList.

set

public void set(java.lang.String name,
                java.lang.String value)
If there is already an attribute with the specified name, then it will have its value changed to match the specified value. If there is no Attribute with the specified name, then one will be created. This method is case-insensitive.
Parameters:
name - The name of the Attribute to edit or create. Case-insensitive.
value - The value to be held in this attribute.
